body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture       People  Learn about the personalities, groups, and cultures who have and continue to influence the Chesapeake Bay and the Captain John Smith Chesapeake National Historic Trail.   Stories Read John Smith's journals and get a glimpse of what it may have been like to witness two worlds colliding in 1607.
title: Captain John Smith Chesapeake National Historic Trail: History & Culture
